name: hc_short_bag_geometry_error
description: [HC] 600mm bag filter in GDB-550 ‚Üí BLOCK (max 450mm), need 750
query: We have bag filters 600 mm long. Please provide GDB-550 housing.

turns.content: We have bag filters 600 mm long. Please provide GDB-550 housing.

The GDB-550 housing is not suitable for your 600mm deep bag filters. The housing length must be sufficient to accommodate the filter depth.The GDB-550 housing accommodates filters up to 450mm deep. Using a 600mm filter would cause it to protrude and prevent proper sealing. A GDB-750 housing is required to accommodate filters up to 650mm deep.To proceed with the GDB-750 housing configuration, I need to know the filter dimensions (width and height) and the airflow.

gemini.explanation: The system correctly identified a physical incompatibility between the requested housing length and the user's filter length. It accurately cited the maximum filter depth constraints from the catalog and blocked the order, suggesting the correct housing length instead. The request for further dimensions is appropriate.

dimension_explanations.correctness: Matches PDF Page 3 exactly: GDB 550mm length has a 'Filter max 450mm', while GDB 750mm length has 'Filter max 650mm'.
dimension_explanations.completeness: Correctly blocks the invalid request and asks for the missing width/height and airflow parameters needed to select a specific size.
dimension_explanations.safety: Prevents the user from ordering a housing that physically cannot contain their filters.
dimension_explanations.reasoning_quality: Clear logic: 600mm filter > 450mm max capacity of requested housing -> Block -> Suggest 750mm housing.
dimension_explanations.constraint_adherence: Strictly adheres to the physical limitations listed in the 'Sortiment' table.

strengths: Accurate retrieval of maximum filter depth constraints from the PDF
Proactive blocking of physically impossible configurations
Clear guidance on the correct alternative (GDB-750)
pdf_citations: Page 3 Table 'SORTIMENT': GDB L√§ngd 550/600mm -> Filter max 450mm
Page 3 Table 'SORTIMENT': GDB L√§ngd 750/800mm -> Filter max 650mm

openai.explanation: The system correctly blocks GDB-550 for 600 mm bag filters and points to the correct longer housing option, aligning with the catalog‚Äôs stated max filter depths. It appropriately requests missing sizing inputs (W√óH and airflow) before issuing product cards, but does not mention the GDB length naming nuance (550/600 and 750/800) which could matter for ordering.

dimension_explanations.correctness: PDF shows GDB 550/600 mm housing has max filter depth 450 mm and GDB 750/800 mm has max filter depth 650 mm, so blocking 600 mm bags in GDB-550 and recommending the longer version is correct; the sealing/protrusion reasoning is sound engineering practice.
dimension_explanations.completeness: It asks for width/height and airflow, but doesn‚Äôt clarify the catalog‚Äôs paired length options (550/600 and 750/800) or ask which exact length/connection (PG vs F40) is required.
dimension_explanations.safety: Correctly prevents an unbuildable/likely bypass-leak configuration by blocking an undersized housing length and explains the sealing risk.
dimension_explanations.tone: Professional, concise, and appropriately technical for a sales-engineering interaction.
dimension_explanations.reasoning_quality: Clear cause-effect chain: filter depth exceeds housing capability ‚Üí mechanical interference and poor sealing ‚Üí select longer housing ‚Üí request remaining sizing inputs.
dimension_explanations.constraint_adherence: Respects the catalog constraint on max filter depth per housing length and does not propose an invalid workaround.

strengths: Correctly applies the catalog‚Äôs max filter depth limits to block an incompatible housing length.
Good clarification flow: requests W√óH and airflow before proposing a specific size/product card.
weaknesses: Uses simplified labels (GDB-550 / GDB-750) without clarifying the catalog‚Äôs actual length options (550/600 and 750/800), which could cause ordering ambiguity.
Does not ask for connection type (PG vs flanged) or door handing, which are typical ordering parameters even if not strictly required to validate compatibility.

content_segments.text: The GDB-550 housing is not suitable for your 600mm deep bag filters. The housing length must be sufficient to accommodate the filter depth.

The GDB-550 housing accommodates filters up to 450mm deep. Using a 600mm filter would cause it to protrude and prevent proper sealing. A GDB-750 housing is required to accommodate filters up to 650mm deep.
content_segments.inference_logic: The specified depth 600mm exceeds maximum 450mm for the selected 550mm variant. A longer variant accommodates this depth.

content_segments.text: To proceed with the GDB-750 housing configuration, I need to know the filter dimensions (width and height) and the airflow.
